title: My Champion Idea (Riot please check this post)
body:
Here is my idea of a new champion. I would be extremely grateful if you added him in and tweaked a few things. All feedback is greatly appreciated and please participate in the poll. I would like to thank Steel Tempest for helping me out with the champion quotes.

Champion Name: Nyle
Pronunciation: Nigh-el

Title: Valorans Defender

About Nyle: Nyle is an old teenager (17/18) and is able to control the earth. Nyle lives at the top of a gigantic mountain, where you can see the most of Valoran. He keeps things in place and makes sure nothing goes too wrong. He defends Valoran from things no one can ever imagine existed but no one appreciates him or even knows about him. He took an oath of keeping his homeland safe and though wars may occur, he was not allowed to take any sides and had to help both teams in ways of him not being able to be seen by them.

LORE:
DELETED SINCE IT DOESNT MAKE SENSE AFTER AURELION SOLS RELEASE

Auto animation - a spike of rock emerges from his hand

Health: 520(+60 per level)
Health Regen: 5.7 (+0.60 per level)
Mana: 363 (+43 per level)
Mana Regen: 6.5 (+0.83 per level)
Ability Power: 55 (+3.8 per level)
Attack Speed: 0.703 (+2.3% per level)
Armor: 20 (+3.75 per level)
Magic Resist: 30 (+4.33 per level)
Movement Speed: 345
AA Range: 540 (Ranged)

Appearance: Blonde hair (curved to the right side of his head), blue eyes, rock gloves, leather clothing, a cape dragging on the ground as he walks (give me some ideas)

What role he is and what he has to offer: Nyle is a tank and a mage and mostly played mid and top. He has quite a bit of CC and is highly effective in team fights by taking down the enemy carry.

Skin idea: 975 RP Blood King Nyle - (Demonic looking) white hair, red eyes, red crown, red cape, red metal gloves, red leather clothing
Changes the look of his abilities (Red rock)

Abilities:
Passive - Defenders Spirit - 
Nyle cries out, unleashing his power every 4th ability creating an AoE effect and dealing magic damage. Nyle also loses 2% of his current health. The passive will not occur if he is too low and will die from the health taken away.

This also puts a 'Mark' on them making abilities do different things (Just to get an idea of what the Mark looks like, it will be a type of stone in the form of a star type thing). If 'Mark' hits an enemies, Nyle gets back 40 / 50 / 60  health.

Q - Earthborn - 
Cooldown: 6 / 5 / 4 / 3.75 / 3.5 /
Nyle charges up a line of rock in his hands and then releases it dealing magic damage and slowing enemies by 30% for 1.5 second. If the enemy has a Mark on them, it reduces their magic resist and armour by 20% for 1.5 seconds (Q stops when it hits an enemy. Does not damage minions and goes through them.)

W - Descendant of the Monolith - 
Cooldown: 10 / 8 / 7 / 6 / 5 /
Nyle slams his fists into the ground creating a small earthquake in a line dealing magic damage and rooting enemies that have been struck for 1.25 seconds. If the enemy has the Mark on them, they get rooted for an extra .75 seconds.

E - Spirits Bolt - 
Cooldown: 10 / 9 / 8 / 7 / 6 / 
Nyle plunges to a targeted location, hardening the earth on where he has rolled. If the enemy walks on the hardened earth, they are slowed by 20% for 1 second. If the enemy has a Mark on them, it increases the slow by 40% for 2 seconds.

R - Defenders Wrath - 
Cooldown: 1:20 / 1:00 / 45 /
Nyle crackles with rage, unleashing his full potential. Walls are marked in red, showing him which ones he can move. If he selects a red wall, he has the option to throw it, dealing 400 / 600 / 800 damage to an enemy, and slowing them by 20% for 1 second. After the wall has been thrown, it glides back to its normal position, assisted with the power of Nyle. However, if Nyle clicks a non-marked wall, his ult is cancelled, and put on 50% cooldown (Only Nyle can see marked walls, and they also have a small range to be thrown in)

Champion Select Quote:
"The defenders will prevail.. No matter the cost."

Joke:
"Want to see a trick?"
Lifts up hands
Ground starts to make a weird cracking sound
"Thatâ€™s not supposed to happen..."

Taunt:
Rises a rock from the earth
"Try not to. Crack under the pressure."
"Carrying your team is like carrying the rock. Only i can do it."
Splits the rock in half

Dance:
Nyle summons rocks from the ground and juggles them (And maybe whistles?).

Movement Quotes:
"They are not grateful."
"Nothing can prepare them."
"The war. Must end."
"I should have saved him when I had the chance."
"I will take revenge."
"No dragon is safe from me.
"They will pay the ultimate price."
(Give me ideas for more quotes)

20% heal? This doesn't really go well with anything else in the kit other than his passive, and encourages building HP to an otherwise full AP and armour build. I'd say move the healing to an ability that can be used more often if you plan on keeping a passive that procs _every fourth ability!_

Honestly, rocks represent unchanging and hardness, I don't think an HP bar that shifts constantly would be fitting. Why not mana or armour debuff instead?

Thank you for the feedback! I have removed the 20% heal on the ultimate and changed the passive to taking away 2% health of your current health away every 6th ability. Also, if 'Mark' hits at least 3 enemies, he gets 30 health back :)

Flat heal and percentage damage? I'm actually excited to see another anti-health champ like Soraka (Especially a tank anti-health champ instead of a squishy healer!), if this happens. In fact, this is actually extremely similar to Soraka in this aspect except all his abilities can potentially heal, and is more efficient at pushing than harassing (I assume 3 enemies counts minions, instead of just champions?)

alright. think about what he wears, how his cloak and guantlets tie into his lore. How did he get them? why does he use them? information like this can really flesh out a character and can help create a more information centric lore. If we look at riots previous champions we can see that a core part of their character is centred around their weapon. Ekkos sword thing, azir's command pole, bruams shield. writing just a little bit about their weaponry can create an interest for people to play him. You could change the gauntlets to rock, because lets face it vi has the steel guantlets already. I like the cape idea, but make it more related. You could say "the cape was his father's before him, and nyle carries around his heritage with a heavy burden" or something cool like that.

enough about lore, cause usually riot dumpster most of their lore. Just look at ekko's lore. Its literally 5 sentences. 
One thing that confuses me is his select quote. Why is he saying "he will regret, mentioning their name". I see you want to go down the whole vengeance road thing, but its worded too complicated. Simply: "No dragon is safe from me", or "Ao shin will pay in blood", or since you mention nyle and his father being defenders, could say: "the defenders will prevail... no matter the cost" (personally i like the last one most as its refrencing the pain he feels over his lost father while also hearing the rage he feels towards ao shin"

Passive: cool idea, but a tank losing percentage health is just sad. Mundo can do it because he literally has an ability that makes him restore 40% 50% 60% of his health. Unless Nyle has a restore health ability, this is basically anti-synergy with his kit. I would change it to restore a percentage of health because its pro synergy, and Nyle doesnt seem to have any sustain in his kit. The mark is a cool idea, keep that.

Q: Balanced, gets bonus slow from mark, basic description. its fine dont change.

W: Hard cc good ability keep it

E: jump with some utility good idea also keep.

R. This is the real dissapointment. This character can shift earth and you gave him a standing still rammus ult with a knockup. Have fun with it! make him have the ability to move terrain, make him move a speeding wall into your enemies for a massive aoe stun damage wombo. Also, make him like really mad, like unleashing his full potential. Literally moving mountains would be fun as.

Other than that, fix your taunts. Really dry stuff.
